channel.title: [Hybrid PvP] - Adding Item [Help]
channel.description:
I want to add a few items such as the max cape, ring of vigor, and other various items.. But I don't know how to get their item dat files. I've seen cache packed items across the forums: but none of them have .dat files like the HyBrid PvP client has.
I do understand how to add them to itemdef.java and item.cfg ect. Just need help on how to add the actual models to the client. I would be very thankful if someone could show me a tut, or explain how to do this.
When I wear Max cape, It removes weponary. Someone mind telling me how I could fix that.

item.title: [Hybrid PvP] - Adding Item [Help]
item.dc:creator: @to_ezz to ezz
item.description:
@to_ezz wrote:

I want to add a few items such as the max cape, ring of vigor, and other various items… But I don’t know how to get their item dat files. I’ve seen cache packed items across the forums: but none of them have .dat files like the HyBrid PvP client has.

I do understand how to add them to itemdef.java and item.cfg ect. Just need help on how to add the actual models to the client. I would be very thankful if someone could show me a tut, or explain how to do this.

When I wear Max cape, It removes weponary. Someone mind telling me how I could fix that.
